name: Forecast Armageddon
description:
Forecast Armageddon is a tower defense game where towers and events are dispensed to the player in a random order where the player defends their base. The player wins by withstanding all the waves without the base being destroyed by utilizing the card conveyer belt and weather advantages.

Use Mouse to play and press ESC to pause at anytime.

WARNING: This is still in development and is a team project at Full Sail University for Video Game Development Degree. Please reach out to me on email dev.stanks@gmail.com with any bugs or suggestions :)
